name: A. Message
statement:
Dr. Moriarty is about to send a message to Sherlock Holmes. He has a
string . String is called a of string if you can read it starting from
some position in the string . For example, string "" has six substrings:
"", "", "", "", "", "".Dr. Moriarty plans to take string and cut out
some substring from it, let’s call it . Then he needs to the substring
zero or more times. As a result, he should obtain a fixed string (which
is the string that should be sent to Sherlock Holmes). One change is
defined as making one of the following actions: Insert one letter to any
end of the string. Delete one letter from any end of the string. Change
one letter into any other one. Moriarty is very smart and after he
chooses some substring , he always makes the minimal number of changes
to obtain . Help Moriarty choose the best substring from all substrings
of the string . The substring should minimize the number of changes
Moriarty should make to obtain the string from it.
